Html: Anyone doing VB.NET using project GNMap who would like to share knowledge and code samples?

Hi Wenner,

The GMap.NET contorl is a drag and drop implementation and does not require any code.   You just need to reference the control dll and tehn you can drag and drop it in.

Hello, this control is awesome, I have a question: I see that when I not have connection can't view the map still with cached images, exist a option to use a "offline mode" to use cached tiles? thank you so much for this great control

cool man, glad you like it :)

i'm not sure how google handle's the offline scenario for google maps.  i'll have to check their documentation and get back to you.

I also dragged the control to the form and referenced everything needed, but I only get a blue screen/map.

What code did you used? Really want to learn how to implement this. Using VB.NET 2010 btw.
Found that I need to change the XML due to use of the 4.0 Frameworks.
I have just started to migrate a project and will be happy to exchange info.
Hi Jamboo, sure thing, I've added you as a developer on the project.

Private Sub loadmap()
    Me.GMapControl1.MouseWheelZoomType = MouseWheelZoomType.ViewCenter
    Me.GMapControl1.DragButton = System.Windows.Forms.MouseButtons.Left


    With Me.GMapControl1
        .MapProvider = GMapProviders.GoogleMap
        .MinZoom = 1
        .MaxZoom = 20
        .Zoom = 1
        .Manager.Mode = AccessMode.ServerAndCache

    End With
End Sub
